roleset.name: count, enumerate, come to a total
roleset.note: Frames file for 'tally' based on sentences in wsj. VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls multiply-108, transcribe-25.4. (from tally-v.01)

example.name: as 'sum, arrive at total'
example.text: With most legislatures adjourned for the year, small business is tallying its scorecard.
example.arg: With most legislatures adjourned for the year

example.name: as 'count'
example.text: City crews tallied the wreckage to buildings, but lacked a clear sense of how gravely transportation arteries were disabled.

roleset.name: tally completely
roleset.note: TALLY-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from tally-v.02)

example.name: Both args
example.text: All that needed to happen was for us to tally up the damages and get our money back .
